name: Level
description: Work with Unreal level in runtime.

parameters.name: should_block_on_load
parameters.description: If this should be a blocking operation - the game will freeze

parameters.name: make_visible_after_load
parameters.description: If this should be visible automatically after loaded

parameters.name: should_block_on_unload
parameters.description: If this should be a blocking operation - the game will freeze

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: If this level should be visible

static_functions.name: GetStreamLevels
static_functions.description: Gets a list of all Stream Levels

table_properties.name: name
table_properties.description: The short name of the Level

table_properties.name: path
table_properties.description: The full path to the Level file

table_properties.name: is_loaded
table_properties.description: If the Level was marked to be loaded

table_properties.name: is_visible
table_properties.description: If the Level is currently visible

table_properties.name: is_temp
table_properties.description: If the Level is temporary (an instance loaded, shouldn't be directly unloaded)

static_functions.name: CallLevelBlueprintEvent
static_functions.description: Calls a Level Blueprint custom event (which can be added when creating levels through Unreal Engine)

parameters.name: arguments...
parameters.description: Sequence of arguments to pass to the event

events.name: StreamLevelLoad
events.description: Called when a Stream Level is loaded

events.name: StreamLevelUnload
events.description: Called when a Stream Level is unloaded

events.name: StreamLevelShow
events.description: Called when a Stream Level is shown

events.name: StreamLevelHide
events.description: Called when a Stream Level is hidden
